description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Valhyre is a third person shooter that allows 2 to 16 players to engage in combat in a 360 degree fantasy environment.  Engaging on the ground and in the air, players can fight each other over 6 different play arenas and 3 different game play types. Valhyre was built from the ground up as a multiplayer experience and requires a Live Gold account to play fully.
